name: Alternative Solutions
description:
Alternative Solutions offers a full suite of consulting services to ensure our clients maximize the return they expect on their Salesforce investment. Our team of certified professionals are experienced in every Salesforce edition and our company specializes in projects of all shapes and sizes.
From initial startup Salesforce.com implementations to advanced second and third order issue resolutions, Alternative Solutions not only increases your expectation in an integration partner, we exceed it.
